core:description.text: A sleek black longline sports bra that offers supportive coverage without sacrificing comfort. Medium-compression knit panels hug the torso while the extended hem smooths seamlessly beneath the slim ribbed cotton tank. Moisture-managing nylon keeps studio sessions cool, and soft binding along the neckline and racerback prevents chafing. Pair it with the red matte Lycra bike shorts for a coordinated training set or wear solo for sculpt workouts.
